ComicInfo.Summary:
Odds on how a celeb will bite the big one.
A cynical look at justice, opportunity, concern, tradition, awareness, teachers, weapons, photography, missing persons, therapy, logic, the office, relationships, and doctors.
What they are really telling you at your graduation.

ComicInfo.Title: The Wicked Link; Perennial Sports Calendar; A Mad Look at Shrek; Mad's Celebrity Cause-Of-Death Betting Odds; The Lighter Side of...; "How We Met" Stories That Today's Young Lovers Will Be Stuck With…Vol. II; Monroe and… the Great American Road Trip Part One; Maimed Flesh Magazine; Creeping Signs that Might Lead You to Believe Global Warning is For Real; The Mad Mall Directory (for Things Regular Mall Directories Never Point Out); Hurl Horror
